doc:
Robert Harron https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Harron 0 Robert Emmett "Bobby" Harron (April 12, 1893 – September 5, 1920) was an American motion picture actor of the early silent film era. Although he acted in over 200 films, he is known for his roles in the D.W. Griffith directed films The Birth of a Nation (1915) and Intolerance (1916). Harron was the older brother of film actors John Harron and Mary Harron. Robert_Emmett_"_Bobby_"_Harron ( April_12_,_1893 – September_5_,_1920 ) was an_American_motion_picture_actor of the_early_silent_film_era . Although he acted in over_200_films , he is_known for his_roles in the_D.W._Griffith directed films The_Birth of a_Nation_(_1915_)_and_Intolerance_(_1916_) . Harron was the_older_brother of film_actors_John_Harron and Mary_Harron .
